name: mm-box
description: A simple flexbox wrapper for attribute based styling.

attributes.name: direction
attributes.description: Instructs the mm-box to arrange it's lightDOM children in a horizontal or vertical orientation (see: flexbox flex-direction).

attributes.name: align
attributes.description: Instructs the mm-box to align it's lightDOM children (see: flexbox align-items).

attributes.name: justify
attributes.description: Instructs the mm-box to justify it's lightDOM children (see: flexbox justify-content).
